component.name: jitsi
component.summary: Open Source Video Calls And Chat

description.p: Jitsi is an audio/video Internet phone and instant messenger that supports some of the most popular instant messaging and telephony protocols such as SIP, Jabber/XMPP (and hence Facebook and Google Talk), AIM/ICQ, Yahoo! Messenger, RSS and counting. Jitsi is completely Open Source / Free Software, and is freely available under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License.
